alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 6:13AM CDT until May 13 at 7:52PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saline River At Benton affecting Saline County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saline River At Benton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Commercial and industrial facilities in the flood plain along the left bank may be affected. Water is deep in the pastures along the west bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 22.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest near 22.9 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 AM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Saline River Benton 18.0 22.9 Fri 5 AM 8.8 6.2 4.5 22.9 7 AM 5/12 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
